properties.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 30 at 9:20AM MST until February 1 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph
possible.

* WHERE...Hill, Chouteau, Liberty and Blaine.

* WHEN...From midnight Friday night to 11 PM MST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds may blow down limbs, trees, and power
lines. A few local power outages are possible. Travel may become
difficult, especially for high-profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and dry conditions on the
plains may cause increased grassland fire danger Friday night
through Saturday in places where there is no snow cover.
properties.instruction:
People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around
trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of
your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if
you must drive.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT FRIDAY NIGHT TO 11 PM MST SATURDAY
